post:
LET,

UGVPS expanded its operations to Atlanta GA this week!! With brand new nodes in Atlanta and also in Los Angeles, I have some crazy deals today. Like always with my offers, there is no limit to how many you can order and the price you see is what you get, the price won't change or increase in following billing cycles!

All plans include 4 CPU Cores. UGVPS is now setting up new servers with more powerful setups. These VPS will be setup on brand new nodes that have SSD Caching for awesome I/O speeds!!

- 2048MB Guaranteed RAM
- 2560MB Burstable RAM
- 60GB Disk Space
- 2000GB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 address
- OpenVZ/SolusVM

6.00/month or $19.00/6 months.
Order: https://www.ugvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=99

- 1024MB Guaranteed RAM
- 1536MB Burstable RAM
- 40GB Disk Space
- 1000GB Monthly Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- OpenVZ/SolusVM

4.25/month or $12/6 months.
